message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique and high-quality item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200.
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit higher than I was hoping to pay. Would you be willing to consider a price of $120?
I understand that $200 is a bit steep for you, but I have to make sure I get a good price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I can offer it to you for $180.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $180 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. Would you be willing to consider a price of $150?
